Detailed Description

Definitions for CTK_ASSERT and CTK_DEBUG_ASSERT macros.

Define Documentation

#define CTK_ASSERT ( _a_   ) 

Value:

do { \
        int assertErrorA = (_a_); \
        if (!assertErrorA) { \
            printf("%s:%d: Assertion failure: (%s) != TRUE\n",\
                    __FILE__,__LINE__,#_a_); \
            fflush(stdout); \
        } } while (0)

#define CTK_ASSERT_EXIT ( _a_   ) 

Value:

do { \
        int assertErrorA = (_a_); \
        if (!assertErrorA) { \
            printf("%s:%d: Assertion failure: (%s) != TRUE\n",\
                    __FILE__,__LINE__,#_a_); \
            fflush(stdout); \
            exit (-1); \
        } } while (0)

#define CTK_ASSERT_RETURN ( _a_,
_ret_   ) 

Value:

do { \
        int assertErrorA = (_a_); \
        if (!assertErrorA) { \
            printf("%s:%d: Assertion failure: (%s) != TRUE\n",\
                    __FILE__,__LINE__,#_a_); \
            fflush(stdout); \
            return (_ret_); \
        } } while (0)
